inclusion.criterion: willing to give written informed consent
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: willing to attend necessary follow up visits
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: pain thought to originate from urinary tract
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: previous urethral surgery (other than urethral dilatation)
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has lower urinary tract symptoms including frequency, urgency, weak stream, incomplete emptying and intermittent flow for the past 9 months. He is otherwise healthy.
